title: Add Facebook profile link to site footer

requirements.summary: Add a Facebook social link/icon in the footer pointing to the provided Facebook profile URL, opening in a new tab with proper accessibility.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a Facebook link/icon under a "Follow Us" (or equivalent) label.
The Facebook link opens in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
The Facebook link is present anywhere the footer renders (including the main site and payment status pages).
The Facebook link has accessible labeling (e.g., aria-label="Facebook").

file_operations.description: Add or update the footer's "Follow Us" social section to include a Facebook icon/link pointing to https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61575271824165, ensuring target="_blank", rel="noopener noreferrer", and an accessible label (e.g., aria-label="Facebook"). Ensure no other social links are added/changed.
Verify the shared Footer component renders on the main site and on payment status pages so the Facebook link is consistently available wherever the footer appears.
